text: Lechosław Michalak (born 22 September 1956) is a Polish former racing cyclist. He won the Tour de Pologne 1977. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Polish male cyclists Category:People from Żyrardów Category:Sportspeople from Masovian Voivodeship
title: Lechosław Michalak
